full_summary:
---

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Project Title:** Dry Dock Refit - David Thompson

**Project Reference Number:** PW-__MD-047-28842

**AMENDMENT NUMBER:** 2

**PUBLICATION DATE:** October 25, 2022

**TENDER CLOSING DATE:** November 16, 2022 2:00 PM EST

**CONTRACTING ENTITY:**

* Agency: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**END USER ENTITY:**

* Organization: Parks Canada
* Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC, J8X 0B3, Canada

** Tender Description:**

Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the refit of the Research Vessel David Thompson. The winning contractor will be responsible for carrying out drying dock operations, inspections, repairs, maintenance, and modifications in accordance with the Statement of Work and any associated technical information.

**WORKS PERIOD:**

* Commencing: November 24th, 2022
* Completing: December 13th, 2022

**Optional Site Visit:**

Bidders are encouraged to visit the work site. A site visit and briefing will be held on November 3, 2022, at 9:00 a.m. EST at the Canadian Coast Guard Base 401 King Street West, Prescott, ON, K0E 1T0.

**Competitive Procurement:**

Bidders will be selected based on the lowest-priced bid. All interested suppliers may participate in this tender.

**Procurement Business Number:**

 Suppliers must have a Procurement Business Number (PBN) before contract award.

**Language:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreement:**

 This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

---

For further information, please contact:
Hugh Slater, Contracting Officer
Email: hugh.slater@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Telephone: (343) 553-9156
